oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Inventory of the estate of Isaac Franklin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Inventory of the Estate of Isaac Franklin, deceased, other than that situated in Louisiana, returned by his Executors in Sumner County, Tennessee and appraised by said Executors and Wiliam Franklin, in presence of Lewis T. White and John F. Sanderson. This inventory provides a listing of the slaves on the plantation of Isaac Franklin in Sumner County, Tennessee. It lists the names of men and women, their age, and at which dollar figure they are valued.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
